comment.author: 66406516@N08
comment._content: At one time this building served as the temporary capitol of the United States.

comment.author: 66406516@N08
comment._content: This facility was used to house accused Lincoln assassination conspirator Dr. Samuel Mudd following his arrest. The annex, known as Carroll Row, housed female prisoners including Confederate spy Rose Greenhow and Mary Surratt, who owned the boarding house where the conspirators met.
